features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram, this piece features a delicate diamond trellis design, accented with leaf-shaped motifs. description: This diamond Haaram effortlessly blends traditional design with modern aesthetics. Its delicate construction ensures comfortable wear, while the brilliant diamonds make it a truly unforgettable statement piece. A testament to impeccable craftsmanship and timeless elegance, it's an investment in enduring style and cultural value. Guaranteed to turn heads and become a cherished heirloom for generations.
